channel.title: Poetries on Apophenian
channel.description: Recent content in Poetries on Apophenian

item.title: Domestic Horticulturalists
item.description: The grass has grown so long, It is underfoot no more. It is around our ankles, Our knees, Our eyes. A green jungle, The blue sky. A tiger like kitten Prowls the grasslands and prairies of our love. A rumbling purr, A quiet resentment, A long past feeling of order and restraint. A painful clarity and of course, The hopeless boredom Of you And me And our contempt for gardening.
